title: Barbecue T-Bone Steaks
ingredients: ['4 teaspoons salt or to taste', '2 teaspoons paprika', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground black pepper', '3/4 teaspoon onion powder', '3/4 teaspoon garlic granules or to taste', '3/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper or to taste', '3/4 teaspoon ground coriander or to taste', '3/4 teaspoon ground turmeric or to taste', '4 (450g) t-bone steaks, at room temperature']
